column10: Essie and Paul went on a concert tour in Scotland in late March. No return date given but most likely March or April 1930
Essie was in Kitzbuhel for 2 months

The U.S. government denied Essie a passport because she would not sign an affidavit stating that she was not a communist
London remained Essie's home base for the next 7-8 years
